short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your job search by seamlessly comparing job descriptions with your CV to ensure the perfect match with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users should install this extension if they are actively job hunting  and want to increase their chances of finding a job that matches their skills and experience. The AI-powered comparison can highlight key areas where the user's CV aligns with the job description, potentially revealing strong matches that the user might have overlooked. This can save users time and effort in their job search, and potentially lead to better job matches and successful applications using OpenAI ChatGPT
